question: {name} watches TV after he finishes his homework every night. On {d1} and {d2}, he watched a {h1}-hour episode of his favorite show each night. On {d3}, he watched a few episodes of a {m1}-minute show. On {d4}, he finished homework early and watched a {h2}-hour episode and a {m2}-minute show. On {d5}, he got to stay up late, so he watched {n2} {h3}-hour episodes. If he watched {total} hours of TV in all, how many {m1}-minute episodes did he watch on {d3}?
